# messagingAppUsage

**Type Property**

The camera session occurs while the user is in the app with messaging capability.

## Declaration

```swift
static var messagingAppUsage: SRFaceMetrics.Context { get }
```

## Camera contexts

- **deviceUnlock**: The camera session occurs while the user has the device unlocked.

items.description: The camera session occurs while the user has the device unlocked.
items.name: deviceUnlock
